DbCommand.CommandText: DELETE FROM [dbo].[z_ob_header] WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id) AND ([ref_no] = @Original_ref_no) AND ([employee_id] = @Original_employee_id) AND ((@IsNull_travel_type = 1 AND [travel_type] IS NULL) OR ([travel_type] = @Original_travel_type)) AND ((@IsNull_purpose_of_travel = 1 AND [purpose_of_travel] IS NULL) OR ([purpose_of_travel] = @Original_purpose_of_travel)) AND ((@IsNull_date_from = 1 AND [date_from] IS NULL) OR ([date_from] = @Original_date_from)) AND ((@IsNull_date_to = 1 AND [date_to] IS NULL) OR ([date_to] = @Original_date_to)) AND ((@IsNull_destination = 1 AND [destination] IS NULL) OR ([destination] = @Original_destination)) AND ((@IsNull_contact_no = 1 AND [contact_no] IS NULL) OR ([contact_no] = @Original_contact_no)) AND ((@IsNull_cost_center = 1 AND [cost_center] IS NULL) OR ([cost_center] = @Original_cost_center)) AND ((@IsNull_position = 1 AND [position] IS NULL) OR ([position] = @Original_position)) AND ((@IsNull_accommodation_type = 1 AND [accommodation_type] IS NULL) OR ([accommodation_type] = @Original_accommodation_type)) AND ((@IsNull_preferred_hotel = 1 AND [preferred_hotel] IS NULL) OR ([preferred_hotel] = @Original_preferred_hotel)) AND ((@IsNull_check_in = 1 AND [check_in] IS NULL) OR ([check_in] = @Original_check_in)) AND ((@IsNull_check_out = 1 AND [check_out] IS NULL) OR ([check_out] = @Original_check_out)) AND ((@IsNull_visa_required = 1 AND [visa_required] IS NULL) OR ([visa_required] = @Original_visa_required)) AND ((@IsNull_emergency_contact = 1 AND [emergency_contact] IS NULL) OR ([emergency_contact] = @Original_emergency_contact)) AND ((@IsNull_passport_no = 1 AND [passport_no] IS NULL) OR ([passport_no] = @Original_passport_no)) AND ((@IsNull_phone_no = 1 AND [phone_no] IS NULL) OR ([phone_no] = @Original_phone_no)) AND ((@IsNull_accompanying_dependents = 1 AND [accompanying_dependents] IS NULL) OR ([accompanying_dependents] = @Original_accompanying_dependents)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_name1 = 1 AND [dependent_name1] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_name1] = @Original_dependent_name1)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_age1 = 1 AND [dependent_age1] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_age1] = @Original_dependent_age1)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_passport1 = 1 AND [dependent_passport1] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_passport1] = @Original_dependent_passport1)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_name2 = 1 AND [dependent_name2] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_name2] = @Original_dependent_name2)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_age2 = 1 AND [dependent_age2] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_age2] = @Original_dependent_age2)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_passport2 = 1 AND [dependent_passport2] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_passport2] = @Original_dependent_passport2)) AND ([created_by] = @Original_created_by) AND ([date_created] = @Original_date_created) AND ((@IsNull_modified_by = 1 AND [modified_by] IS NULL) OR ([modified_by] = @Original_modified_by)) AND ((@IsNull_date_modified = 1 AND [date_modified] IS NULL) OR ([date_modified] = @Original_date_modified)) AND ((@IsNull_status = 1 AND [status] IS NULL) OR ([status] = @Original_status)))

INSERT INTO [dbo].[z_ob_header] ([ref_no], [employee_id], [travel_type], [purpose_of_travel], [date_from], [date_to], [destination], [contact_no], [cost_center], [position], [accommodation_type], [preferred_hotel], [check_in], [check_out], [visa_required], [emergency_contact], [passport_no], [phone_no], [accompanying_dependents], [dependent_name1], [dependent_age1], [dependent_passport1], [dependent_name2], [dependent_age2], [dependent_passport2], [created_by], [date_created], [modified_by], [date_modified], [status]) VALUES (@ref_no, @employee_id, @travel_type, @purpose_of_travel, @date_from, @date_to, @destination, @contact_no, @cost_center, @position, @accommodation_type, @preferred_hotel, @check_in, @check_out, @visa_required, @emergency_contact, @passport_no, @phone_no, @accompanying_dependents, @dependent_name1, @dependent_age1, @dependent_passport1, @dependent_name2, @dependent_age2, @dependent_passport2, @created_by, @date_created, @modified_by, @date_modified, @status); SELECT ref_id, ref_no, employee_id, travel_type, purpose_of_travel, date_from, date_to, destination, contact_no, cost_center, position, accommodation_type, preferred_hotel, check_in, check_out, visa_required, emergency_contact, passport_no, phone_no, accompanying_dependents, dependent_name1, dependent_age1, dependent_passport1, dependent_name2, dependent_age2, dependent_passport2, created_by, date_created, modified_by, date_modified, status FROM z_ob_header WHERE (ref_id = SCOPE_IDENTITY())

SELECT ref_id, ref_no, employee_id, travel_type, purpose_of_travel, date_from, date_to, destination, contact_no, cost_center, position, accommodation_type, preferred_hotel, check_in, check_out, visa_required, emergency_contact, passport_no, phone_no, accompanying_dependents, dependent_name1, dependent_age1, dependent_passport1, dependent_name2, dependent_age2, dependent_passport2, created_by, date_created, modified_by, date_modified, status FROM dbo.z_ob_header

[destination] = @destination, [contact_no] = @contact_no, [cost_center] = @cost_center, [position] = @position, [accommodation_type] = @accommodation_type, [preferred_hotel] = @preferred_hotel, [date_modified] = @date_modified, [status] = @status WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id) AND ([ref_no] = @Original_ref_no) AND ([employee_id] = @Original_employee_id) AND ((@IsNull_travel_type = 1 AND [travel_type] IS NULL) OR ([travel_type] = @Original_travel_type)) AND ((@IsNull_purpose_of_travel = 1 AND [purpose_of_travel] IS NULL) OR ([purpose_of_travel] = @Original_purpose_of_travel)) AND ((@IsNull_date_from = 1 AND [date_from] IS NULL) OR ([date_from] = @Original_date_from)) AND ((@IsNull_date_to = 1 AND [date_to] IS NULL) OR ([date_to] = @Original_date_to)) AND ((@IsNull_destination = 1 AND [destination] IS NULL) OR ([destination] = @Original_destination)) AND ((@IsNull_contact_no = 1 AND [contact_no] IS NULL) OR ([contact_no] = @Original_contact_no)) AND ((@IsNull_cost_center = 1 AND [cost_center] IS NULL) OR ([cost_center] = @Original_cost_center)) AND ((@IsNull_position = 1 AND [position] IS NULL) OR ([position] = @Original_position)) AND ((@IsNull_accommodation_type = 1 AND [accommodation_type] IS NULL) OR ([accommodation_type] = @Original_accommodation_type)) AND ((@IsNull_preferred_hotel = 1 AND [preferred_hotel] IS NULL) OR ([preferred_hotel] = @Original_preferred_hotel)) AND ((@IsNull_check_in = 1 AND [check_in] IS NULL) OR ([check_in] = @Original_check_in)) AND ((@IsNull_check_out = 1 AND [check_out] IS NULL) OR ([check_out] = @Original_check_out)) AND ((@IsNull_visa_required = 1 AND [visa_required] IS NULL) OR ([visa_required] = @Original_visa_required)) AND ((@IsNull_emergency_contact = 1 AND [emergency_contact] IS NULL) OR ([emergency_contact] = @Original_emergency_contact)) AND ((@IsNull_passport_no = 1 AND [passport_no] IS NULL) OR ([passport_no] = @Original_passport_no)) AND ((@IsNull_phone_no = 1 AND [phone_no] IS NULL) OR ([phone_no] = @Original_phone_no)) AND ((@IsNull_accompanying_dependents = 1 AND [accompanying_dependents] IS NULL) OR ([accompanying_dependents] = @Original_accompanying_dependents)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_name1 = 1 AND [dependent_name1] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_name1] = @Original_dependent_name1)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_age1 = 1 AND [dependent_age1] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_age1] = @Original_dependent_age1)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_passport1 = 1 AND [dependent_passport1] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_passport1] = @Original_dependent_passport1)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_name2 = 1 AND [dependent_name2] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_name2] = @Original_dependent_name2)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_age2 = 1 AND [dependent_age2] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_age2] = @Original_dependent_age2)) AND ((@IsNull_dependent_passport2 = 1 AND [dependent_passport2] IS NULL) OR ([dependent_passport2] = @Original_dependent_passport2)) AND ([created_by] = @Original_created_by) AND ([date_created] = @Original_date_created) AND ((@IsNull_modified_by = 1 AND [modified_by] IS NULL) OR ([modified_by] = @Original_modified_by)) AND ((@IsNull_date_modified = 1 AND [date_modified] IS NULL) OR ([date_modified] = @Original_date_modified)) AND ((@IsNull_status = 1 AND [status] IS NULL) OR ([status] = @Original_status))); SELECT ref_id, ref_no, employee_id, travel_type, purpose_of_travel, date_from, date_to, destination, contact_no, cost_center, position, accommodation_type, preferred_hotel, check_in, check_out, visa_required, emergency_contact, passport_no, phone_no, accompanying_dependents, dependent_name1, dependent_age1, dependent_passport1, dependent_name2, dependent_age2, dependent_passport2, created_by, date_created, modified_by, date_modified, status FROM z_ob_header WHERE (ref_id = @ref_id)
DELETE FROM [dbo].[z_ob_cash_advance] WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id) AND ([ref_no] = @Original_ref_no) AND ([purpose] = @Original_purpose) AND ([amount] = @Original_amount))

INSERT INTO [dbo].[z_ob_cash_advance] ([ref_no], [purpose], [amount]) VALUES (@ref_no, @purpose, @amount); SELECT ref_id, ref_no, purpose, amount FROM z_ob_cash_advance WHERE (ref_id = SCOPE_IDENTITY())
SELECT ref_id, ref_no, purpose, amount FROM dbo.z_ob_cash_advance

UPDATE [dbo].[z_ob_cash_advance] SET [ref_no] = @ref_no, [purpose] = @purpose, [amount] = @amount WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id) AND ([ref_no] = @Original_ref_no) AND ([purpose] = @Original_purpose) AND ([amount] = @Original_amount)); SELECT ref_id, ref_no, purpose, amount FROM z_ob_cash_advance WHERE (ref_id = @ref_id)

DELETE FROM [dbo].[z_ob_transportation] WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id) AND ([ref_no] = @Original_ref_no) AND ((@IsNull_vehicle_type = 1 AND [vehicle_type] IS NULL) OR ([vehicle_type] = @Original_vehicle_type)) AND ((@IsNull_date = 1 AND [date] IS NULL) OR ([date] = @Original_date)) AND ((@IsNull_destination = 1 AND [destination] IS NULL) OR ([destination] = @Original_destination)) AND ((@IsNull_flight_vessel = 1 AND [flight_vessel] IS NULL) OR ([flight_vessel] = @Original_flight_vessel)) AND ((@IsNull_etd = 1 AND [etd] IS NULL) OR ([etd] = @Original_etd)) AND ((@IsNull_eta = 1 AND [eta] IS NULL) OR ([eta] = @Original_eta)) AND ((@IsNull_pickup_time = 1 AND [pickup_time] IS NULL) OR ([pickup_time] = @Original_pickup_time)))

INSERT INTO [dbo].[z_ob_transportation] ([ref_no], [vehicle_type], [date], [destination], [flight_vessel], [etd], [eta], [pickup_time]) VALUES (@ref_no, @vehicle_type, @date, @destination, @flight_vessel, @etd, @eta, @pickup_time); SELECT ref_id, ref_no, vehicle_type, date, destination, flight_vessel, etd, eta, pickup_time FROM z_ob_transportation WHERE (ref_id = SCOPE_IDENTITY())
SELECT ref_id, ref_no, vehicle_type, date, destination, flight_vessel, etd, eta, pickup_time FROM dbo.z_ob_transportation

UPDATE [dbo].[z_ob_transportation] SET [ref_no] = @ref_no, [vehicle_type] = @vehicle_type, [date] = @date, [destination] = @destination, [flight_vessel] = @flight_vessel, [etd] = @etd, [eta] = @eta, [pickup_time] = @pickup_time WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id) AND ([ref_no] = @Original_ref_no) AND ((@IsNull_vehicle_type = 1 AND [vehicle_type] IS NULL) OR ([vehicle_type] = @Original_vehicle_type)) AND ((@IsNull_date = 1 AND [date] IS NULL) OR ([date] = @Original_date)) AND ((@IsNull_destination = 1 AND [destination] IS NULL) OR ([destination] = @Original_destination)) AND ((@IsNull_flight_vessel = 1 AND [flight_vessel] IS NULL) OR ([flight_vessel] = @Original_flight_vessel)) AND ((@IsNull_etd = 1 AND [etd] IS NULL) OR ([etd] = @Original_etd)) AND ((@IsNull_eta = 1 AND [eta] IS NULL) OR ([eta] = @Original_eta)) AND ((@IsNull_pickup_time = 1 AND [pickup_time] IS NULL) OR ([pickup_time] = @Original_pickup_time))); SELECT ref_id, ref_no, vehicle_type, date, destination, flight_vessel, etd, eta, pickup_time FROM z_ob_transportation WHERE (ref_id = @ref_id)
DELETE FROM [z_approvers_approval] WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id))

SELECT z_approvers_approval.* FROM z_approvers_approval

UPDATE [z_approvers_approval] SET [ref_no] = @ref_no, [approver_id] = @approver_id, [approver_level] = @approver_level, [tag] = @tag, [status] = @status, [approval_date] = @approval_date WHERE (([ref_id] = @Original_ref_id))
DELETE FROM [z_ob_lodging] WHERE (([ref_id] = ?))

UPDATE [z_ob_lodging] SET [ref_no] = ?, [accommodation_type] = ?, [preferred_hotel] = ?, [check_in] = ?, [check_out] = ? WHERE (([ref_id] = ?))
